column1: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions everywhere +2|+2 and Overwhelm.

The Herald spread her arms wide as she lifted her face to the sun, which hung bloody and red above Shurima. "Hail, the Magus Ascendant," she breathed beatifically, her voice echoing off the ring of ruined columns. "Hail, Xerath!"
